title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Donate
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Donate            Donate       Your tax-deductable gift furthers important work at Mount Rushmore National Memorial. Private donations help preserve the various natural and cultural resources, maintain trails, and provide brochures and interpretive programs each year. Donations may be dedicated to enhancing specific activities, such as visitor services, educational programs, maintenance, research, or scientific study. The care and stewardship of your national park is our primary concern and task. Your interest in assisting with these efforts is greatly appreciated and is truly a critical component of the National Park Service's continuing work. Donations to benefit Mount Rushmore can happen in a number of different ways. We would be happy to visit with you more and answer any questions you might have. Please contact one of the following by mail, phone or e-mail: Superintendent Cheryl A. Schreier 13000 Highway 244 Bldg. 31, Ste. 1 Keystone, SD 57751 Telephone: 605-574-3131 e-mail us Maureen McGee-Ballinger, Chief of Interpretation and Education 13000 Highway 244, Bldg.31, Ste. 1 Keystone, SD 57751 Telephone: 605-574-3115 e-mail us Julie Gregg-Bubac, National Park Service, Commercial Services ProgramManager/Partnerships, Mount Rushmore National Memorial 601 Riverfront Dr., Omaha, NE 68102-4226 Telephone: cell 605-391-0234; office 402-661-1772 e-mail us Thank you for your interest in Mount Rushmore National Memorial and the NationalPark Service. We look forward to hearing from you!
